subject: Your payment approval has be
body: Your payment approval has been confirmed by the United Nation,kindly get back to me so that your money can be transferred to you within days of your response.Thanks.

subject: Re:   Your payment approval has be
body:
Dear Sir/Madam,

I am glad to hear that my payment approval has been confirmed. Could you please provide me with the necessary details for the transfer of funds? I look forward to your prompt response.

Best regards,
Lewis D.

Best wishes,
Barbara
